Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Troy in 1983...
Injured on 6/29/1983 with a Pulled Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1985, off Freddie Echandi (CI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/1985, off Walter Mccaw (CI)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1985, hitting .429 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1985, hitting .520 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1985, hitting .367 with 9 HR, 28 RBI...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Won Outstanding Newcomer Award in 1985, hitting .272 with 24 HR, 100 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Halifax on 8/28/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1988, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Injured on 8/14/1989 with a Bruised Heel, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 9/22/1989 with a Broken Ribs, out for 2-3 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1990, hitting .429 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Injured on 6/3/1990 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (FBA) on 2/23/1991 to a 3-year deal worth $2,983,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1991, hitting .381 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1991, hitting .542 with 1 HR, 9 RBI...
